name: Super Space-Stronaut (AdamGrisdale)
description:
This is my 2D platformer project for MI 445.

List of Changes:

Custom Music: 3 tracks written, recorded, and mixed.

New Levels: Added 2 new distinct levels.

More Buttons and UI: Added new try again buttons to avoid having to return to the main menu after losing. Expanded the credits page to include an about section.

Credits:

MSU GEL Lab for art assets, sound effects, and scripts.
